OtherEmssnFctrSetItem.name: OtherEmssnFctrSetItem
OtherEmssnFctrSetItem.description: Represents the individual entries for emissions and conversion factors for various data types and sources that are neither the electricity grid nor scope 3 data types.

CalorificValue.description: The calorific value of the fuel source.

CalorificValueUnit.description: The unit of measure for the calorific value of the fuel source.

Ch4EmissionFactor.description: The CH4 emissions factor for petroleum fuel source.

Ch4EmissionFactorUnit.description: The unit of measure for the CH4 emissions factor.

Co2EmissionFactor.description: The CO2 emissions factor for petroleum fuel sources.

Co2EmissionFactorUnit.description: The unit of measure for the CO2 emissions factor.

Co2eEmissionFactorInTco2eGj.description: The CO2-equivalent emissions factor that's calculated in tonnes of CO2-equivalent emissions per gigajoule (GJ).

Co2eEmissionFactorInTco2eMwh.description: The CO2 equivalent emissions factor that's calculated from CO2, CH4, and N2O emissions factors

ExternalIdentifier.description: The external identifier for the emissions factor.

FuelType.description: The type of fuel associated with this emissions factor record. For custom fuels, if the NamespacePrefix exists then this value is {NamespacePrefix}_custom_{DeveloperName of the FuelType object}; for example, ftPackage_custom_wood, else this value is custom_{DeveloperName of the FuelType object}; for example, custom_wood.

FuelTypeRefId.description: This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

N2oEmissionFactor.description: The N2O emissions factor for petroleum fuel sources.

N2oEmissionFactorUnit.description: The unit of measure for the N2O emissions factor.

ParentEmissionFactorId.description: The name of the parent emissions factor.

ReferenceDataLoadLogId.description: The reference data load log record that's associated with the emissions factor.

ShouldLockDtastUpdtForRec.description: Indicates whether the emissions factor record can be locked from dataset updates.

SuppliedEmissionsFactor.description: The CO2 equivalent emissions factor provided by the vendor to override the CO2e emissions factor thatâ€™s calculated using the CO2, CH4, and N2O emission values.

SuppliedEmissionsFactorUnit.description: The unit of measure for the supplied emissions factor value. For custom fuel unit of measure, if the NamespacePrefix exists then this value is {NamespacePrefix}_custom_{DeveloperName of the SustainabilityUom object}; for example, ftPackage_custom_bundle, else this value is custom_{DeveloperName of the SustainabilityUom object}; for example, custom_bundle.
